fusetools.cloud_tools.GCP¶

class fusetools.cloud_tools.GCP[source]¶

Bases: object

Functions for interacting with GCP infrastructure.

Methods

delete_bucket_objects

Deletes objects from a GCP storage bucket.

download_bucket_objects

Saves a list of GCP storage objects to a local directory.

get_bucket

Returns a GCP storage bucket object.

get_bucket_objects

Returns a list of bucket objects from a GCP storage object.

load_bucket_objects

Loads a list of objects to a GCP storage bucket.

make_credentials

Creates an authenticated GCP client object.
classmethod delete_bucket_objects(obj_list)[source]¶

Deletes objects from a GCP storage bucket.

Parameters

obj_list – List of GCP storage objects to delete.

Returns

Nothing

classmethod download_bucket_objects(obj_list, sav_dir)[source]¶

Saves a list of GCP storage objects to a local directory.

Parameters

  • obj_list – List of GCP bucket storage objects.

  • sav_dir – Local directory to save objects to.

Returns

Nothing

classmethod get_bucket(client, bucket_name)[source]¶

Returns a GCP storage bucket object.

Parameters

  • client – Authenticated GCP client object

  • bucket_name – Name of GCP bucket.

Returns

GCP storage bucket object.

classmethod get_bucket_objects(bucket_obj, prefix=False)[source]¶

Returns a list of bucket objects from a GCP storage object.

Parameters

  • bucket_obj – GCP storage bucket object to pull list of contained objects from.

  • prefix – Optional filter to include to filter bucket object paths by.

Returns

List of GCP storage bucket objects.

classmethod load_bucket_objects(bucket, file_list, sav_dir)[source]¶

Loads a list of objects to a GCP storage bucket.

Parameters

  • bucket – Name of GCP storage bucket.

  • file_list – List of local names to load.

  • sav_dir – Local directory containing files to load.

Returns

Nothing

classmethod make_credentials(cred_method, gcloud_project_name, gcloud_token_dict=None, gcloud_token_path=None)[source]¶

Creates an authenticated GCP client object.

Parameters

  • cred_method – Credentials object, JSON file from disk or JSON object in memory.

  • gcloud_project_name – Name of GCP project.

  • gcloud_token_dict – Name of JSON GCP token if in memory.

  • gcloud_token_path – Name of JSON GCP token if on disk.

Returns

Authenticated GCP client.
